item.title: HEAD
item.author: 7rans
item.description:
Current Development

1 Major Enhancements

  • Use confection library for vclog config.
    7rans 2011-11-06 16:23:00

7 General Enhancements

  • fix glob bug for rc file
    7rans 2011-04-25 18:37:56
  • use .vclog or config/vclog file rather than rules.rb file for configuration
    7rans 2011-04-25 13:03:47
  • change case of meta files
    7rans 2011-04-19 16:38:55
  • history file versions can use underscores (subversion style)
    7rans 2010-11-21 12:54:43
  • autotag can take alternate history file option
    7rans 2010-11-21 12:54:05
  • tag commit date is not necessarily the same as the tag date
    7rans 2010-11-21 11:41:01
  • extraction methods return objects instead of arrays
    7rans 2010-11-21 11:40:25

item.description:

  • rename command to

    7rans 2010-11-19 17:23:23

item.author: 7rans
item.description:
In this release the heuristics interface has changed such that the block is passed the commit message and the matchdata, instead of the previous matchdata splat. The rule can alos return either the sybolic label or a two element array of label and new message, which allows the rule to "massage" the message as needed. This release also improves the git log parser to be much more robust.

1 Major Enhancements

  • change interface of heuristics to accept message and matchdata
    7rans 2010-06-24 17:52:25

3 General Enhancements

  • replace --detail option with opposite --summary option
    7rans 2010-06-27 14:30:49
  • rule block can take none, matadata, or message and matachdata
    7rans 2010-06-27 14:29:33
  • git adapter parses changes more robustly
    7rans 2010-06-27 10:04:11

item.author: 7rans
item.description:
This release repairs the Atom feed format and adds an RSS feed format. Both formats are nearly conformant with strict validations --only a couple minor issues remain to iron out (such as embedded feed url). Ragardless, they should work fine with feed readers (which are not as strict).

3 General Enhancements

  • add title to html changelog
    7rans 2010-06-23 23:52:31
  • fix git email value and imporve feed formats
    7rans 2010-06-23 23:31:08
  • work on atom and rss output formats
    7rans 2010-06-23 23:05:40

item.author: 7rans
item.description:
7 General Enhancements

  • handle unset labels gracefully and improve default heuristics
    7rans 2010-06-21 21:10:11
  • add version command and continue to improve cli help
    7rans 2010-06-21 20:37:15
  • cli uses closest matching subcommand
    7rans 2010-06-21 17:59:06
  • add ansi format and fix tag date groupings
    7rans 2010-06-21 17:40:34
  • filter history by level
    7rans 2010-06-21 14:10:06
  • cli has subcommands and templates can be .rb or .erb
    7rans 2010-06-21 13:13:31
  • Heuristics system for categorizing commits
    7rans 2010-06-21 13:13:00

item.author: 7rans
item.description:
This release adds support for Mercurial repositories and Atom newsfeed output format. The commandline inteface has change such that --format/-f is used to select the format instead of using the previous per-format options, e.g. use -f xml instead of --xml. This release also includes some subtantial changes under-the-hood --the first of a two part code refactoring process.

2 Major Enhancements

  • re-orient design about vcs classes (partially complete)
    7rans 2010-05-28 14:29:55
  • add Mercurial support; also renamed VCS to Adapters
    7rans 2010-05-27 17:47:54

4 General Enhancements

  • Merge branch 'master' of git@github.com:proutils/vclog
    7rans 2010-05-28 17:55:17
  • update syckle plugin to match refactoring
    7rans 2010-05-28 15:42:00
  • add atom support for release history
    7rans 2010-05-28 15:32:07
  • info methods need to be public
    7rans 2010-05-28 14:55:18

1 Generate Enhancements

  • log examples
    7rans 2010-05-28 17:49:11

1 Bug Fixes

  • fixed delta groupings and other improvements
    7rans 2010-05-28 09:39:07

item.author: 7rans
item.description:
This release includes some basic improvments and a few bug fixes. The primary change you might encounter is the need to use -e or --extra in order to see the detailed Changes list in the Release History. Also changed 'git-log' to 'git log', as it seems the latest versions of git does not support the many executables any longer. SVN support requires xmlsimple library. Note also that SVN support is lack luster at this time becuase it hits the server every time an 'svn log' command is issued which is done once for each tag when a history is generated (any one know a better way?).

2 Major Enhancements

  • use erb as template system for all formats
    7rans 2010-01-16 15:05:52
  • support 'type:' fromat commit types
    7rans 2010-01-02 02:19:32

5 Bug Fixes

  • Sort release tags in correct order
    7rans 2010-05-26 10:22:26
  • change 'git-log' to 'git log'
    7rans 2010-05-26 09:47:53
  • change 'git-log' to 'git log'
    7rans 2010-05-26 09:40:54
  • fix version bumping and display
    7rans 2010-02-08 11:07:19
  • syckle plugin now works with latest vclog changes
    7rans 2010-01-16 10:50:30

1 Test Enhancements

  • add first cucumber feature
    7rans 2010-05-26 20:26:28

4 General Enhancements

  • add a canonical lib
    7rans 2010-05-26 20:27:33
  • use xmlsimple for SVN support
    7rans 2010-05-26 20:27:14
  • use meta/name and meta/suite
    7rans 2009-11-14 09:59:49
  • readded markup output for changelog
    7rans 2009-10-26 16:18:35

item.author: 7rans
item.description:
For the an end-user the only significant change is the support of label: notation for commit labels. I have found that I am much more apt to use them if they come first in the commit message and that some developers already use the label: notation to specify system module effected --a useful system of labeling.

2 Major Enhancements

  • use erb as template system for all formats
    7rans 2010-01-16 15:05:52
  • support 'type:' fromat commit types
    7rans 2010-01-02 02:19:32

2 Bug Fixes

  • syckle plugin now works with latest vclog changes
    7rans 2010-01-16 10:50:30
  • fixed spelling of revision (from revison)
    7rans 2009-10-26 15:38:39

7 General Enhancements

  • use meta/name and meta/suite
    7rans 2009-11-14 09:59:49
  • readded markup output for changelog
    7rans 2009-10-26 16:18:35
  • renamed command.rb to cli.rb
    7rans 2009-10-26 15:43:04
  • more refactoring and fixed SVN support
    7rans 2009-10-26 15:16:55
  • rewrote release history generator
    7rans 2009-10-26 09:15:32
  • added ad to website. I want my ! ;)
    7rans 2009-10-23 10:32:51
  • added some todo items
    7rans 2009-10-23 10:30:05

item.author: 7rans
item.description: Version 1.2 overhuals the internals so that History output is based on scm tags, not on a pre-existing history file. This is really the proper way to go about it and those who use it will, I think, be happily surprised at how it promotes good practices for the maintenance of History files. This overhaul led to substantial changes in the command-line interface.

item.description:
